description.value: ValueSet IMMZD2DTTyphoidViPS for IMMZ.D2.DT.Typhoid.ViPS. Business rule: Determine if the client is due for a typhoid vaccination according to the national immunization schedule Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any Table: Unconjugated Vi polysaccharide (ViPS) schedule
